Text:
Thanks a lot............................. GOPO. I have been waiting for the BRRips. And finally you did it. Amazing work man!!!!

Can you please....... do the remaining movies? Please take your own time.
Thanks for this and all your movies. I'm getting atleast 90% of them. Extremely good collection already.

Nice Gopo. Great work! Beautiful quality!

:O)

Thanks A Lot kriss_kringle.

And Definitely We Will Wait For The Rest 007s.

Great Choice.

Did anyone had problems while playing "Diamonds are Forever" ? There are some horizontal lines in the screen. Other movies from this package works fine.

I had experienced it also with Gopo's Mad Max package, where Mad Max II had the same problem during the whole movie.

Does anyone knows if it can be fixed ?

Thanks.

Thanks for the Great download!!!! Absolute Quality in video and audio!!!! There is only one Bond, James Bond. And that is Sean Connery, period.
Thanks Again!!!!
